day_57.content:
Day 57 plan: ```json
{
  "day_57": {
    "topics": [
      "Introduction to Big Data Analytics",
      "Need for Big Data",
      "Data Classification",
      "Big Data Characteristics",
      "Big Data Types"
    ],
    "time_allocation": {
      "Introduction to Big Data Analytics": 0.5,
      "Need for Big Data": 0.5,
      "Data Classification": 1,
      "Big Data Characteristics": 1,
      "Big Data Types": 1
    },
    "practice": [
      "Classify different data examples into structured, semi-structured, and unstructured categories.",
      "Compare and contrast traditional data processing with Big Data processing."
    ],
    "key_concepts": [
      "4Vs of Big Data",
      "Differences between structured, semi-structured, and unstructured data",
      "Challenges posed by Big Data"
    ]
  },
  "day_58": {
    "topics": [
      "Big Data Classification Table",
      "Data Usages",
      "Scalability and Parallel Processing",
      "Designing Data Architecture",
      "Data Quality"
    ],
    "time_allocation": {
      "Big Data Classification Table": 0.5,
      "Data Usages": 0.5,
      "Scalability and Parallel Processing": 1.5,
      "Designing Data Architecture": 1,
      "Data Quality": 1
    },
    "practice": [
      "Explain the different types of scalability and their relevance to Big Data.",
      "Describe the five-layer approach to designing data architecture.",
      "List and define the five R's of data quality."
    ],
    "key_concepts": [
      "Vertical and Horizontal Scalability",
      "Cloud Computing models (IaaS, PaaS, SaaS)",
      "Five-layer data architecture",
      "Five R's of Data Quality"
    ]
  },
  "day_59": {
    "topics": [
      "Data Pre-processing",
      "Big Data Platform",
      "Hadoop and its Core Components",
      "Hadoop Ecosystem Tools"
    ],
    "time_allocation": {
      "Data Pre-processing": 1,
      "Big Data Platform": 0.5,
      "Hadoop and its Core Components": 1.5,
      "Hadoop Ecosystem Tools": 1
    },
    "practice": [
      "Outline the steps involved in data pre-processing.",
      "Describe the core components of Hadoop and their functions.",
      "Match Hadoop ecosystem tools to their respective functionalities."
    ],
    "key_concepts": [
      "ETL process",
      "HDFS, MapReduce, YARN",
      "Functions of ZooKeeper, Oozie, Sqoop, Flume, Pig, Hive, HBase"
    ]
  }
}
```
